[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rocketbase/vue-extra-decorators](./vue-extra-decorators.md) &gt; [DataOpts](./vue-extra-decorators.dataopts.md)

## DataOpts interface

Parameters of the [@Data](./vue-extra-decorators.data.md) decorator and its flavors

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
interface DataOpts<T> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [default](./vue-extra-decorators.dataopts.default.md) | <code>T &#124; TFunction&lt;T&gt;</code> | A default value or a function constructing a default value. Arrays or objects are supported, if you want to use a literal function as a default value, use literal instead. |
|  [literal](./vue-extra-decorators.dataopts.literal.md) | <code>T</code> | A default value. If a function is given, it will be passed as a literal value instead of being executed as a factory. |
|  [sync](./vue-extra-decorators.dataopts.sync.md) | <code>string</code> | The name of a vue property to sync this data property with. On update to said property, the value of the decorated property will be changed as well. on changes to the data property, an <code>update:PROPNAME</code> event will be emitted, where PROPNAME is the name of the property to sync with. |
